name: Nest_3_OfferMain
description: Offering contract. Offering + take order + NEST allocation.

eventDecorators.name: OfferContractAddress
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new COMP speed is calculated for a market. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

eventDecorators.name: OfferTran
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new COMP speed is calculated for a market. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

parameterDecorators.name: voteFactory
parameterDecorators.description: Voting contract address.

functionDecorators.name: find
functionDecorators.description: Search the contract address list of the target account (reverse order).

parameterDecorators.name: start
parameterDecorators.description: Search forward from the index corresponding to the given contract address (not including the record corresponding to start address).

parameterDecorators.name: count
parameterDecorators.description: Maximum number of records to return.

parameterDecorators.name: maxFindCount
parameterDecorators.description: The max index to search.

parameterDecorators.name: owner
parameterDecorators.description: Target account address.

returnDecorators.description: Separate the offer records with symbols. use , to divide fields: uuid,owner,tokenAddress,ethAmount,tokenAmount,dealEthAmount,dealTokenAmount,blockNum,serviceCharge*.

functionDecorators.name: getPrice
functionDecorators.description: Get offer information according to the index.

parameterDecorators.name: priceIndex
parameterDecorators.description: Offer index.

functionDecorators.name: getPriceCount
functionDecorators.description: Get the number of offers stored in the offer array.

functionDecorators.name: list
functionDecorators.description: Get the list of offers by page.

parameterDecorators.name: offset
parameterDecorators.description: Skip the first offset records.

parameterDecorators.name: count
parameterDecorators.description: Maximum number of records to return.

parameterDecorators.name: order
parameterDecorators.description: Sort rules. 0 means reverse order, non-zero means positive order.

returnDecorators.description: Separate the offer records with symbols. use , to divide fields: uuid,owner,tokenAddress,ethAmount,tokenAmount,dealEthAmount,dealTokenAmount,blockNum,serviceCharge*.

parameterDecorators.name: ethAmount
parameterDecorators.description: Offering ETH amount.

parameterDecorators.name: erc20Amount
parameterDecorators.description: Offering erc20 token amount.

parameterDecorators.name: erc20Address
parameterDecorators.description: Offering erc20 token address.

functionDecorators.name: sendErcBuyEth
functionDecorators.description: Taker order - pay erc20 and buy ETH.

parameterDecorators.name: ethAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of ETH of this offer.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of erc20 of this offer.

parameterDecorators.name: contractAddress
parameterDecorators.description: The target offer address.

parameterDecorators.name: tranEthAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of ETH of taker order.

parameterDecorators.name: tranTokenAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of erc20 of taker order.

parameterDecorators.name: tranTokenAddress
parameterDecorators.description: The erc20 address of taker order.

functionDecorators.name: sendEthBuyErc
functionDecorators.description: Taker order - pay ETH and buy erc20.

parameterDecorators.name: ethAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of ETH of this offer.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of erc20 of this offer.

parameterDecorators.name: contractAddress
parameterDecorators.description: The target offer address.

parameterDecorators.name: tranEthAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of ETH of taker order.

parameterDecorators.name: tranTokenAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of erc20 of taker order.

parameterDecorators.name: tranTokenAddress
parameterDecorators.description: The erc20 address of taker order.

functionDecorators.name: turnOut
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw the assets, and settle the mining.

parameterDecorators.name: contractAddress
parameterDecorators.description: The offer address to withdraw.
